gnome-recipes-local-wisdom.title: GNOME Recipes & Local Wisdom
gnome-recipes-local-wisdom.intro:
This topic including:

* GNOME Recipes in general; introducing GNOME Recipes
* About Indonesian cuisine; introducing Indonesian cuisine and why Indonesia
* How to collect Indonesian recipes; tells about how to collect Indonesian recipes through a contest
* The effort to translate Indonesian recipes into English; tell about the process of internationalization of the recipe
* Why not translate existing recipes; tells why localization of existing recipes and their obstacles
* The effort to translate UI recipes; tells how to translate UI on recipe

gnome.title: GNOME.Asia Summit
gnome.intro: GNOME.Asia Summit is the featured annual GNOME Conference in Asia. The event focuses primarily on the GNOME desktop, but also covers applications and the development platform tools. It brings together the GNOME community in Asia to provide a forum for users, developers, foundation leaders, governments and businesses to discuss the present technology and future developments.GNOME.Asia Summits have been held in Beijing, Ho-Chi-Minh City, Taipei, Bangalore, Hong Kong, Seoul, Beijing, Depok, New Delhi, Chongqing respectively over the last ten years.
